summary: Enthusiastic Senior Machine Learning Engineer with extensive experience in Computer Vision, Python, and Research. Passionate about joining a cutting-edge company and contributing to imaging projects. Skilled in designing and implementing advanced computer vision models, working autonomously or as part of a collaborative team. Proven expertise in deep learning, image processing, and strong commercial experience with Python. Committed to contributing technical expertise and strong communication skills to drive impactful solutions for the company's innovative projects.

experience.title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer
details: Tested the performance of the algorithms before rolling them out
Improved damage size estimation by reducing the average error from more than 40% to less than 20%. The algorithm estimated the depth better than DepthAnything model
Improved the latency of pixel to millimeter ratio calculation by 20% per passage
Reduced the cost of face detection by 57% by fixing bugs related to custom face detection model.
